original: intros a b Q H1. unfold reduceplus in H1. unfold s2p in H1. unfold CombLinear in H1. destruct H1 as [H2|H3 H4 H5 H6 H7]; try contradiction. unfold s2p. rewrite H6. apply CombLinear_1. - apply ltM_dec. - unfold s2p. intros a' p' q' s. unfold reduceplus. unfold s2p. unfold CombLinear. right. apply (reduceplus_cb2_lem _ _ _ _ H2 H4). reflexivity.
